mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, user_id AS userId, user_name AS userName, points AS points, distance AS distance, carbon_saved AS carbonSaved, created_at AS createdAt, level AS level, achievements AS achievements FROM USER_RANK WHERE user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1

SELECT id AS id, user_id AS userId, user_name AS userName, points AS points, distance AS distance, carbon_saved AS carbonSaved, created_at AS createdAt, level AS level, achievements AS achievements FROM USER_RANK WHERE user_name = #{name} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_RANK (USER_ID, USER_NAME, POINTS, DISTANCE, CARBON_SAVED, LEVEL, ACHIEVEMENTS, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, user_name AS userName, points, distance, carbon_saved AS carbonSaved, created_at AS createdAt, level, achievements FROM USER_RANK ORDER BY distance DESC, points DESC LIMIT 3
